Package com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game Description

    game

     package game

    Describes the objects that have a more direct relation to the game itself rather than its structure. Contains the Visible Object class as well as all of the classes that inherit from it. Also contains other gameplay related elements such as abilities and items.
